question: Which of the following does not form a part of the electoral college of the President?
option1: The elected members of both the Houses of Parliament
option2: The elected members of the legislative assemblies of the states
option3: The elected members of the legislative assemblies of the Union Territories of Delhi and Puducherry
option4: The nominated members of either House of Parliament
answer: The nominated members of either House of Parliament
explanation: The electoral college of President consists of: (1) the elected members of both the Houses of Parliament; (2) the elected members of the legislative assemblies of the states; andÂ  (3) the elected members of the legislative assemblies of the Union Territories of Delhi and Puducherry. The nominated members does not form a part of electoral college.
